comments:
I got an NPE performing the following steps:

1. start Eclipse and stay in resource perspective
2. go to the PDE/Advanced Tracing prefernce page
3. Select workspace plugins

I never imported any plugins.

This is a known issue that seems to be related to changes made to the property 
sheet implementation. A Platform UI bug has been opened to track this.
